entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
